Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory825.jpg'}
{3: "Whoosh—even the earmuffs can't stop the sound of the clay disc flying."}
{3: 'The orange blur makes a perfect arc under the lights, about to reach that invisible apex point.'}
{3: 'The hand gripping the wooden forestock lifts slightly, while the other hand, which controls the firing, has reflexively positioned its index finger on the trigger.'}
{2: '(Pull the trigger)', 3: '10'}
{3: 'The blast from the gun kicks the stock against your shoulder, and you get that familiar gunpowder smell.'}
{3: 'You barely see the shot leave the barrel before the clay pigeon explodes into orange smoke.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Hit! Let me check the speed... 26 meters per second! You've got sharp eyes, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Work the bolt to eject the shell)', 3: '18', 4: "If it's just one target, I'm not bad.", 5: '19'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Hey 【kuroname】, want to try some clay pigeon shooting?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Bridget's about fifty yards away, leaning on the clay pigeon launcher, waving you over."}
{2: "Since we're here, might as well give it a shot!", 4: "Let's see how this is different from shooting practice back in Phaos."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Since it's your birthday, I'm going all out now!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Ready, 【kuroname】?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You double-check the chamber, then grab two shells from your pouch and load them into the barrels.'}
{2: '(You give an OK sign)', 3: '30', 4: 'All set!', 5: '30'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Alright, ready—', 4: '1'}
{3: "She taps the machine's screen a few times, then turns and runs to you."}
{2: 'Bridget!', 3: '36', 4: "Watch out, that's dangerous!", 5: '36'}
{3: 'You instinctively point the gun barrel toward the clay pigeon launcher, but no high-speed spinning disc shoots out from the top of the cylindrical machine.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Relax, it's on a timer. The Support Force's safety protocols—they're super strict!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'I got this, no worries.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget smiles, then steps beside you and puts her left hand on your left arm next to the wooden forestock.'}
{2: 'This...', 3: '43', 4: "What's up, don't trust my shooting?", 5: '43'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Remember, you're using my break-action shotgun today, 【kuroname】.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "This old gun's reliable, but all the races mean she's got some quirks now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Ballistics, you know, they never go by the book.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "My Commandant's gotta be the most experienced with sidearms on the battlefield...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "But this time, how about letting this old gun's owner give the commands?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Three short countdown beeps draw their attention, and soon the cylindrical machine emits a muffled buzzing sound.'}
{3: 'The machine throws out two blurry circles, crossing paths in the air.'}
{3: 'Bridget guides your arm, helping you move the barrel in a smooth arc.'}
{3: 'At the same time, she taps your shoulder.'}
{2: '(Quickly pull the trigger)'}
{3: 'Bang! Bang!'}
{3: 'Two loud bangs happen almost at once, transforming the airborne discs into clouds of colorful mist.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Eject, reload!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In under three seconds, you finish. Bridget helps you aim again.'}
{3: 'The clay pigeon launcher starts up again, ready for more.'}
{3: 'A dozen or so spent shells scattered across the ground emit wisps of smoke, while scorching air fills the surroundings.'}
{3: 'Lowering the barrel, letting your nerves settle down.'}
{3: 'The colorful clouds are still there, making it feel unreal under the starlight.'}
{2: '(Hold on, that looks like...)', 3: '74', 4: 'Bridget, look!', 5: '74'}
{3: "The colored bits aren't just floating around—they're making a pattern recognizable to the human eye."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: '【kuroname】, Happy Birthday!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before you can even process what you saw, her happy voice cuts through the gunpowder smell.'}
{2: "So that's what you were up to with the machine earlier...", 3: '80'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Hey, even small surprises take some planning, you know?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Looks like she planned the colors and where they'd fly."}
{3: 'Bridget puts her hands over yours, helping you lift the heavy shotgun.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Even though my current frame can handle trouble with Tactical Tonfas...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Back when humans were still around, this shotgun my mom gave me was all I had to protect myself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Every night in my sleeping bag, seeing this old gun in my bag... with the campfire crackling, makes me feel safe.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "This shotgun's not as strong as modern guns, but it's like a good luck charm, and it's been with me all this time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'I want you to feel that same sense of safety, 【kuroname】!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Let's go back together, I want to help you find the best spot for that gun in your room, 【kuroname】!", 4: '1'}
